segments.text: Hi , Tom ! This is Marry with Hans furniture store .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just wanted to let you to know that we had decided to offer the sales position to someone else .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We considered you very carefully but the other candidate has more experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe so . But I'm fast learner and I'm willing to work overtime to learn the business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I must to ask you to reconsider your decision and give me a chance .
segments.speaker: S2
